content: Om doesn’t like Spotify anymore. I’m so sick of Daniel moaning and groaning about Apple. And to be clear, Apple isn’t doing itself any favors with its App Store tax. I definitely want to extract myself from Spotify and have been doing so bit by bit, but there are some playlists I will miss dearly. And I have many years' worth of playlists on Spotify that make the cost of switching high for me.
